name: Jelly Drops!
description:
Swipe, match, and pop tasty jelly drops to puzzle your way through hundreds of fun levels in this new match 3 puzzle adventure! Challenge your brain with fun and creative puzzles, create powerful boosters, and relax with cute squishy jellies!

To reach the high score, you'll have to get a good feel for the game board, plan your moves carefully, and use boosters strategically to get out of sticky situations. Smash and pop jelly drops, find gummy bears and crunch chocolate obstacles across hundreds of levels full of tasty game play.


How To Play Jelly Drops!

• Swap and match 3 or more candy jellies of the same type to pop them!
• Make unique combinations to get awesome bombs and create fantastic explosions!
• Leverage powerful boosters to help clear obstacles!


Jelly Drops is different from other free puzzle games - your fun is the most important ingredient! No always online, no timers, no bells and whistles; just lots and lots of frantic puzzle fun!

What makes Jelly Drops special?

Free items every day!
Other free match 3 games make you pay for booster items, but with the daily spin in Jelly Drops you have the chance to get them for free every single day!

Unlimited lives!
Where's the fun in waiting for new lives just to play more? That's what we thought! So in this game, there's no lives, no timers, no hearts - play as much as you want whenever you want!

Straight-up puzzle fun!
The puzzles are the best part of any match 3 game! So instead of adding lots of boxes you need to click through and world maps to scroll, Jelly Drops keeps it simple and gives you what you came for: hundreds of fun and challenging gummy drop puzzles!

No data needed!
Tired of worrying about your internet connection every time you want to play a game? Don't! Jelly Drops will work even with no internet and no wifi. It's so simple: just start the app and start the fun!

Addictive Match 3 game play!
Relax and enjoy the simple yet addictive gummy drop puzzles, crunch tasty candy and smash squishy jellies. With dynamic obstacles, creative level layouts and varied challenges, you'll always be wondering what puzzle challenge might be waiting for you in the next level.

Completely free!
Best of all, Jelly Drops is completely free! Some optional in-game items do require payment, but it's possible to get all of them for free from the daily spin or as presents for playing!

Download now and start matching cute jellies today!
